issue.title: [Python] Arrow fails linking against statically-compiled Python
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2545](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2545). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1661?focusedCommentId=16462745&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-16462745 : to link statically against `libpythonXX.a`, you need to add in some system libraries such as `libutil`. Otherwise some symbols end up unresolved.
